entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Rosthern
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:14 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
